001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.stream.Collectors;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl;
007import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
008import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
009
010public class MarkedAdapter extends AdapterImpl implements Marked {
011        
012        private List<? extends Marker> markers;
013
014        public MarkedAdapter(List<? extends Marker> markers) {
015                this.markers = markers;
016        }
017
018        @Override
019        public List<? extends Marker> getMarkers() {
020                return markers;
021        }
022        
023        @Override
024        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
025                return Marked.class == type;
026        }
027        
028        @Override
029        public String toString() {
030                return super.toString() + " " + markers == null ? "(empty)" : markers.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
031        }
032
033}
